title: How do I restore my phone to its default settings?
answer:
1. Go to Settings and touch Backup & reset > Factory data reset. 

 2. Touch Back up my data to back up important data on your phone, such as messages and contacts. Then touch Reset phone. Touch Erase everything to restore your phone to its factory settings. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=113101)
